name: Escape (itch) (JamesBryan)
description:
**This Game requires a controller to play***

The game starts and you'r a prison guard in a cell. You notice no one is around, your objective is to ESCAPE. You notice as you'r escaping that the Inmates have something seriously wrong with them. They are ZOMBIES. You must escape the prison to survive but you come across some interesting things on your breakout.

Tech: James Bryan

Design: Darragh Nolan

Production: Chris Finn

This is the Exe version of a game I made in a group . This is an exe file because WebGL could not handle the full game. Please download and enjoy. Thank you for playing and all feedback is welcome.
